entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 5:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain this evening then to a few flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
